sentences.english: Keep the cable coils stacked in the same order as they were when they were on the drum.
sentences.chinese: 在鼓輪上保持鋼索盤的旋轉方向與原來一致。

sentences.english: Place on a prepared tray, brush the tops lightly with egg.
sentences.chinese: 放在鋪好烤紙的烤盤上，刷上蛋液入預熱烤箱。

sentences.english: The game is a draw if both teams lose at once.
sentences.chinese: 若兩個隊伍同時輸掉，則該盤遊戲爲和局。

sentences.english: The 120-degree CCPM is by far most popular among pilots of all levels.
sentences.chinese: 在各層水平的飛手中，目前120度十字盤最爲流行。
大明蝦｜盤煎，香蒜，百里香，檸檬。

sentences.english: Eating utensils and food trays are cleaned at the hygiene station with premoistened towelettes.
sentences.chinese: 就餐器具和食物盤在衛生站用預先弄溼的小毛巾清理。

sentences.english: The above research results reflect the shock isolation effect and hanging wall effect of fractures.
sentences.chinese: 本研究結果反映斷裂的隔震效應與上盤效應。

sentences.english: He was upside down in a tank of water with chains and lodes all around the lank .
sentences.chinese: 他倒立在一個水箱中，水箱外都盤着鎖鏈。

sentences.english: Dessert silverware, if not brought out with the dessert, are placed at the top of your entrée plate.
sentences.chinese: 如果甜品沒擺出來，裝甜品的銀器就放在主菜盤。

sentences.english: Would you like some soup or appetizer to start with you meal ?
sentences.chinese: 請問你要不要先點頭盤或湯？

sentences.english: Can broadcast check a document and various digital product of USB inner document.
sentences.chinese: 可以播放USB盤文件和各種數碼產品內的文件。

sentences.english: In general , a clutch has a clutch has a clutch disc as its major part.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，離合器以離合器盤爲其主要部件。

sentences.english: It is well known that accretion disks are hydrodynamic disks with anomalous viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 天體物理吸積盤是具有反常粘滯的流體盤。

sentences.english: It is well known that accretion disks are hydrodynamic disks with anomalous viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 天體物理吸積盤是具有反常粘滯的流體盤。

sentences.english: The upper section of a classical building, resting on the columns and constituting the architrave, frieze, and cornice.
sentences.chinese: 柱頂盤，上橫樑一座古典的建築的上部，置於。

sentences.english: There was a computer game that I wanted to have. My parents would not buy it for me.
sentences.chinese: 我想買一個電腦遊戲盤，可父母不給買。
